title: Well, LoL doesnt Start anymore,
body:
Heyo,

as said in the top, my LoL wont start anymore, running lol.launcher.exe/admin.exe i get the big LoL Icon, after that nothing else happens. The game is open in the Task manager as "LoL Pather (32 Bit)". To begin with yesterday i closed LoL and Shutdown the PC today, i wanted to start it, and thats what happening now. After waiting like 30 mins W/O killing the LoL Pather in Task Manager BugSplatRC resource DLL not found pops up. I deinstalled all LoL content i have on this PC and wanted to DL a clean new LoL, but even the new DLed LoL client wont start up. Any Other Ideas? I am done reading LoL and other Forums now, nothing helped.

PS:
I did the steps shown here [](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq2) "Change Your screen Freresh Rate, and Resetting "Winsock" 
I updated my Graphics Driver
I Updated NetFrame
and some other Stuff.

EDIT1: Running it on Win10
EDIT2: As i am not the only one getting Problems since the new Client came up "live" i opened a Support ticket with all the Logs i could get, seems like u guys should make it too, so riot can gather Files and find the Problem.

replies.body: The issue you're experiencing may be caused by a change in your OS security settings that's now blocking the client from launching.  I know you've taken a few steps to resolve this already, but those steps won't really fix this issue (aside from running as admin).  Instead, I recommend going through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help get that fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Some of us are savvy with PCs, and have been playing League for years, and tried all these type things before we bother posting.   These "fixes" don't solve the problems.   Something else is wrong, and it's not a permissions thing.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nIEqzodc,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-16T17:15:03.398+0000)
>
> The issue you're experiencing may be caused by a change in your OS security settings that's now blocking the client from launching.  I know you've taken a few steps to resolve this already, but those steps won't really fix this issue (aside from running as admin).  Instead, I recommend going through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help get that fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Nothing helped

Thanks for trying!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help look into this.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to obtain a set of logs for context, and attach it to your ticket.  We'll get back to you asap!
Same.   It's obviously broken, starting the new and/or the old .exe results in items in Task Manager, but that's it.   Guess Rito doesn't want my money  :)
Hi, I have the exact same problem.

GUYS I THINK I FOUND IT OUT! took my Riot Games folder to another folder that didn't have an "Ä" letter. Then the launcher opened! Maybe you also have some "weird" letters in the folder you have the game installed in?{{summoner:30}}

> [{quoted}](name=UrBaaNius,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nIEqzodc,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-16T18:43:28.621+0000)
>
> GUYS I THINK I FOUND IT OUT! took my Riot Games folder to another folder that didn't have an "Ä" letter. Then the launcher opened! Maybe you also have some "weird" letters in the folder you have the game installed in?{{summoner:30}}

Yep, but now i changed it, it goes like Icon, and then Program doesnt work anymore, pls close.

EDIT: Well i deleted all files related to the Folder with letters like ü ä ö spaces and stuff, it starts, and seems like dling ur the man of the hour ;D Well i know u shouldn use letters like that in folder names and stuff, but did work before. Seems like they need to fix some stuff with the new Client.
Interesting info, and I'll pass it along.  Keep in mind that the default directory is usually **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**, which doesn't save to a location with special characters.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nIEqzodc,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-11-16T19:33:02.940+0000)
>
> Interesting info, and I'll pass it along.  Keep in mind that the default directory is usually **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**, which doesn't save to a location with special characters.

Well, even if u have anything related to LoL in such a folder, it wont start, i tried to install another Version/Portable Version wich didnt work. And as metioned b4 the new Client came out, it worked fine aswell.

EDIT: Dont get me wrong, as any1 whos using a PC for work and stuff, u shouldnt use such symbols anyway anywhere.
i havent found any can u help me a bit?

Hello,

Your answers are focusing exclusively on Windows and so does your help/support pages. I have the same issues on a MAC.
I have checked my permissions and they are fine. nothing changed since this morning when it worked.

Thank you
I think I found a solution....I have the same problem and turns out the drive I installed League is full. Therefore, I just clear out some space in my drive and League Launcher works again.

I have the same issue as described in the initial thread. I am using a MAC. This is important since on a windows machine everything works fine ( laggy as hell in game with the new client but works ).

Please give us a solution for this. I already opened a support ticket and have received nothing yet.

Yeah, same issue for me. Booted up the old client today, upgraded to the new one, played some games and then quited League before dinner. After, I tried booting up the old client, gave me a PVP error or something. Searched for the new client's .EXE file and guess what, I didn't even open it. Just gave me the loading symbol on my cursor and nothing happend... So no League for me I guess.

> [{quoted}](name=PracticeEngage,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nIEqzodc,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-11-16T17:36:21.040+0000)
>
> Yeah, same issue for me. Booted up the old client today, upgraded to the new one, played some games and then quited League before dinner. After, I tried booting up the old client, gave me a PVP error or something. Searched for the new client's .EXE file and guess what, I didn't even open it. Just gave me the loading symbol on my cursor and nothing happend... So no League for me I guess.

well i didnt Update to new Launcher or anything, i just booted the PC and tried starting it. Didnt even know that the new Client is out for OpenBeta and "live" seems like something got F***ed by Riot with the new Client? Btw my Friend can Start and play normal.
